title: "Swiss Map"
output: html_document

### 瑞士
```{r}
library(ggmap)
library(mapproj)
map <- get_map(location = 'Swiss', zoom = 7, language = "zh-TW")
ggmap(map)
```

### 瑞士 伯恩位置 經度:7.44744 緯度:46.94809
```{r}
library(ggmap)
library(mapproj)
map <- get_map(location = c(lon = 7.44744, lat = 46.94809),
  zoom = 10, language = "zh-TW")
ggmap(map)
```

### 瑞士 伯恩 道路地圖 (1)
```{r}
library(ggmap)
library(mapproj)
map <- get_map(location = c(lon = 7.44744, lat = 46.94809),
  zoom = 10, language = "zh-TW", maptype = "roadmap")
ggmap(map)
```
